column4: does any know a program i can use to make phone calls to regular phones for Ubuntu?
It's not so much the program as the service.
Skype and/or other sip phones can make calls to regular phones if you're using them to connect to a service that can connect to the regular phone system.
I know it's possible to make regular calls on skype, because my friend does all the time.  I don't know if oyu have to pay extra, etc.
